translations: n.[食品]凝乳（原形为 curd, 但常用复数）
v.使成凝乳（curd 的第三人称单数形式）

sentences.sentence: Little Miss Muffet sat on a tuffet eating some curds and whey.
sentences.translation: 小玛菲特小姐坐在矮凳上，吃着凝乳和乳清。

sentences.sentence: All who remain in the land will eat curds and honey.
sentences.translation: 在境内所剩的人，都要吃奶油与蜂蜜。

sentences.sentence: The curds (of “curds and whey”) are mostly made of this protein.
sentences.translation: 凝乳（凝乳和乳清）的主要是由酪蛋白组成的。
